short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Download Calendar (.ics)' button to the Workday popup list and generates ICS file on click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your academic scheduling with this powerful Chrome extension. The UBC Workday Calendar Generator integrates seamlessly into your Workday platform, adding a convenient "Download Calendar (.ics)" button, making it easier than ever to export your UBC course schedules directly to your calendar app.


Features:

- One-Click ICS Export: Quickly export your course schedules with a single click. The "Download Calendar (.ics)" button is added directly to your Workday interface for easy access.
- Accurate Event Formatting: Automatically formats your course schedules into the industry-standard ICS format, complete with event titles, times, locations, and descriptions.
- Supports Complex Schedules: Handles various meeting patterns, including alternate weeks and changing date ranges, ensuring your calendar remains accurate.
- Dynamic Button: The download button appears dynamically whenever you're viewing your schedule, so it's always available when needed.


How It Works:

1. Install the Extension: Add the UBC Workday Calendar Generator to your Chrome browser.
2. Open Workday: Navigate to your Workday account and view your course schedule.
3. Download Your Schedule: Click the "Download Calendar (.ics)" button to generate and download your schedule as an ICS file.


Why Youâ€™ll Love It:

Take control of your academic schedule with this user-friendly tool. By exporting your courses into a format compatible with Google Calendar, Outlook, and other apps, the UBC Workday Calendar Generator helps you stay organized and on top of your classes.


Permissions:

- Read and change your data on myworkday.com: This permission is needed to access your course schedules and format them into calendar events.


Get Started:

Enhance your academic planning today with the UBC Workday Calendar Generator. Install now and make managing your course schedule easier than ever!
